I live in new york city.
I am a writer.
I am married.
I have ten nieces and nephews.
I enjoy going to museums.

participant_2.background:
I had 128 tackles last year.
The name of my team is the baltimore ravens.
My position is linebacker.
I am an athlete.
I play football.

content.text: Hey! I'm a writer living in New York City.
Cool! I'm an athlete living in Baltimore.
What sport do you play?
I'm a linebacker for the Baltimore Ravens.
Wow! That's awesome! What's your favorite thing about being a linebacker?
I love the physicality of the game. I also love being able to make big plays to help my team win.
That's cool! I'm sure it's a lot of work, but it must be really rewarding to be able to help your team win.
It is. I love being part of a team and working together to achieve a common goal.
That's great! So, what do you like to do for fun outside of football?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, go to the movies, and play video games.
Those sound like fun things to do. What's your favorite video game?
I like to play a lot of different video games, but my favorite is probably Madden.
I like Madden too! I'm not very good at it, but it's still a lot of fun.
It's a lot of fun to play with friends and see who can win.
Yeah, I agree. It's a great way to relax and have some fun.
It is. So, what do you do for work?
I'm a writer. I write for a variety of publications, including newspapers, magazines, and websites.
That's cool! I've always wanted to be a writer.
It's a lot of fun, but it can also be challenging.
I'm sure it can be. But I think it would be really rewarding to be able to write something that people enjoy reading.
It is. It's a great feeling to know that you've made someone laugh or cry with your words.
That's what I would love to do. I want to write something that will make people feel something.
I think you could do that. You seem like a very talented writer.
Thanks! I appreciate that. I've always wanted to be a writer, but I've been too scared to try.
You should give it a try! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the encouragement.
You're welcome!
